summary: The Strengthening Local Processing Act of 2025 aims to support small and very small meat and poultry processing establishments. The bill amends existing acts to provide guidance and resources for Hazard Analysis and Critical Control Point (HACCP) plans, increase the federal share for state inspection expenses, and expand cooperative interstate shipment programs. It also establishes a processing resilience grant program, offering financial aid to eligible entities. Finally, it authorizes funding for processor career training programs, including apprenticeships.
